metadata.title: CVE-2023-32006 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The use of `module.constructor.createRequire()` can bypass the policymechanism and require modules outside of the policy.json definition for agiven module. This vulnerability affects all users using the experimentalpolicy mechanism in all active release lines: 16.x, 18.x, and, 20.x. Pleasenote that at the time this CVE was issued, the policy is an experimentalfeature of Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
